ResearchProjectDef.label: simple curtains
ResearchProjectDef.description: Unlocks simple construction techniques to make rings, simple hooks, and poles for the production of curtains, which open far faster than standard doors, but slowly vent temperatures between rooms.

ResearchProjectDef.label: prisoner containment
ResearchProjectDef.description: Provides simple prison doors to keep inmates safe, well, mostly.

ResearchProjectDef.label: remote doors
ResearchProjectDef.description: Unlocks remote doors for remote containment as well as buttons and levers to manipulate them.

ResearchProjectDef.label: hinges and gates
ResearchProjectDef.description: Hinges and fastening techniques allow for the construction of swinging doors, such as large gates.

ResearchProjectDef.label: blast doors
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows for the production of blast absorbing pressurized blast doors.
